message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I'll give you 40, but I deserve more!

You're getting close to losing everything, Alice. Don't make me have to take it all!
Bob, I'm desperate now. I know this is a huge concession, but I'm willing to give you more. Let's end this game before we both lose everything!
You're running out of options, Alice. I'm taking what I want!
Bob, we're almost at the end.  I'm putting all my chips on the table. This is my absolute final offer.  Please, let's settle this before we both get nothing!
You're almost out of luck, Alice. I'm taking the last crumbs.
Bob, please! This is my last chance.  I'm willing to give you almost nothing, just so we don't lose everything. We can still get something, or we both get nothing. It's up to you.
You should have taken my offer when you had the chance, Alice. Now you get nothing.
